    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Matematični čarobni kvadrat</string>
            <string language="en">Mathematical magic square</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematisches magisches Quadrat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Place magique mathématique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quadrado mágico matemático</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quadrato magico matematico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικό μαγικό τετράγωνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadrado mágico matemático</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Na učnem listu so tri različno težavne naloge. Naloga od učencev zahteva kombinacije in primerjanje različnih operacij.</string>
            <string language="en">Three exercises in multiplication, subtraction and addition ordered by difficulty.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">seštevanje</string>
            <string language="en">addition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odštevanje</string>
            <string language="en">subtraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">deljenje</string>
            <string language="en">division</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">čarobni kvadrat</string>
            <string language="en">magic square</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drei Übungen in der Vermehrung, in Abzug und in 
Hinzufügung bestellt durch Schwierigkeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trois exercices dans la multiplication, la 
soustraction et l'ajout commandés par difficulté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Três exercícios na multiplicação, na 
subtração e na adição requisitadas pela dificuldade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tre esercitazioni nella moltiplicazione, nella 
sottrazione e nell'aggiunta ordinate dalla difficoltà.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρεις ασκήσεις στον πολλαπλασιασμό, την αφαίρεση και 
την προσθήκη που διατάζονται από τη δυσκολία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tres ejercicios en la multiplicación, la 
substracción y la adición pedidas por dificultad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hinzufügung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abzug</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abteilung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magisches Quadrat</string>
          </keyword>
